short_description: riprow™ is a sporting goods store based in colorado, united states.
long_description: riprow is a universal movement trainer. riprow is used by recreational and elite riders worldwide. with 12 levels of resistance and control of handlebar speed, workouts can be tuned precisely for user needs. custom colors and branding are available. he is an award winning journalist and infographics artist, information designer, software designer, champion mountain bike racer, mountain bike skills instructor, inventor, entrepreneur, author, teacher, corporate speaker and spiritual leader. lee studied exercise physiology, journalism and creative writing at humboldt state university in arcata, ca. • 1,000,000s of video views on youtube, facebook, instagram and outside tv. it's used by mountain bikers, motocrossers, football players, mixed martial artists, volleyball players, skiers, physical therapists, and active people of all sorts. these movements also empower great bmx, cyclocross, motocross, skiing, horseback riding, furniture carrying, baby making and many other things humans do. it helps mountain bikers ride faster, easier and safer.

generated_description: riprow is a company that specializes in the development and production of a universal movement trainer designed for mountain biking, bmx, and motocross. the riprow device is designed to help riders improve their technique, strength, and fitness through full-body row and anti-row movements. it provides resistance in both the pull and push directions, targeting various muscle groups including the lower legs, thighs, hips, core, back, chest, shoulders, and arms. the riprow is adjustable in terms of resistance and handlebar speed, allowing for customized workouts to meet individual needs. the device is used by both recreational and elite riders worldwide and has been praised for its effectiveness in enhancing athletic performance and fitness.
